This has quickly become a very special place to our family. The staff is absolutely phenomenal! Each class is engaging and has value. If you're on the fence about doing it or having a child try it, give it a shot! You owe yourself the opportunity to experience how professional and great this place is!!!
Best school I've ever been at! Great family atmosphere. Awesome coaches and training partners. Get in shape and learn valuable skills all while having fun.

name: Stone Hill Winery
address: 1110 Stone Hill Hwy, Hermann, MO 65041, USA
reviews: There are many beautiful views from this winery. It has a charming atmosphere. The store is full of great gift ideas and fun favorites for wine lovers. You can purchase any of their wines from the store as well. We had fun sampling all of the wines from a list and discovered some new favorites! The cellar tours and samples do have a cut off time, so plan accordingly. You can dine here and listen to live entertainment.

I don't drink wine but I brought my husband here for some wine tasting and dinner. He loved the wines so much that we brought home 6 bottles! We took the free tour through the cellars and it was very interesting and informative. Jani (I hope I got that right) was our guide and I really enjoyed the history she shared with us, it was the best wine tour we have ever had. The cellars were amazing! Then we went into the barn for dinner and it did NOT disappoint! You can sit in a horse stall and order authentic German food here. The staff were friendly and kept our glasses full. The food came out pretty quickly and tasted great! We have lived in 8 states, been to 48 states, and visited several wineries. This by far was the most unique, beautiful, and historic winery so far. Everything was excellent and we absolutely loved our afternoon spent here. Will definitely be back for sure!

Tour was great, but after a long weekend already I opted out of the wine tasting. I look forward to it next time. However I did hear a lot of praise for the wine from other visitors. Hope to make a trip back very soon!

Stone Hill Winery and Vintage Restaurant sits atop a hill overlooking the historic town of Hermann, MO. Of all the wineries in Hermann, Stone Hill offers the most inspiring views. Take the tour and see the caverns built generations ago where barrels of wine are aged. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable and will proudly talk about the awards taken by Stone Hill’s wines at state and national competitions. We bought a bottle of 2013 Norton and enjoyed it outside at one of the many picnic tables around the grounds. There are two large tasting rooms, and despite two tour buses full of visitors on hand, we were able to belly up for a tasting without waiting. There is a restaurant on site but we did not try it. You can definitely plan to spend a whole afternoon or evening here.
This place is a must see in Hermann! The tour is excellent and the tasting rooms were very quaint. The wines are really good! Selection is excellent. Property and view is amazing

name: The Grand Cafe
address: 107 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews:
The Grand Cafe is a eclectic place for casual dining in the heart of the Capitol City, Jefferson City, Missouri.  The menu offered a good array of options from which to choose.  I ordered the BLT Wrap with the House Fries.  My partner ordered the Cubano Panini with the House Fries.  Both of us felt the fries were okay, but not warm enough to taste and lacked a crispness and saltiness one might expect of a higher quality French Fry.   The service was exceptionally good, and yet we did not learn the Server’s name until we saw it on the check.

I ordered the Gooey Butter Chocolate Brownie with a side scoop of vanilla ice cream.  It was not only beautifully plated and presented, but delicious AND expensive.  Be certain you inquire about the prices of desserts BEFORE you order as mine was as much as what I ordered for lunch.   It was ample, but not of such quality that warranted the price.  

Overall, this is a good, casual dining location in the State Capitol.  Seating was comfortable, and the dining area clean.   They may want to consider refinishing the metal ceiling as while it is distressed painting, it may appear to some dining customers to be peeling paint.

Parking on Saturday was not bad, but go early.

ENJOY
We came in and were greeted immediately. I love that everyone is pleasant and happy we are here. Smiles are nice. This is an upscale dining experience for sure. Prices are a little extravagant but you're also paying for class an ambience as well. Every once in a while we deserve to splurge. 
We had the Cobb salad and the southwest panini w/chips
They were very delicious! 
Our service was excellent!
I would definitely return

One of the top restaurants in Jefferson City, this is the place to go if you have visitors to impress. Great location in the heart of downtown. They have unique dining options and a great cozy atmosphere. Full service bar and outdoor dining is also offered. Highly recommended!

The Grand was probably our first love in Jeff City! From business meetings to date nights, we usually will always end up at the Grand for some portion of the night. The specials are always extra delicious and the jalapeño margarita from Kevin is a must try.

Food is delicious. Craft cocktails. Service wasn't bad but not the best I've ever had. Otherwise, would've given 5 stars. Iced coffee cocktail pictured. Highly recommend beet salad. Cuban panini was really good.

name: Madison's Cafe
address: 216 Madison St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews:
The best restaurant I’ve ever eaten that was right here. The food is so delicious and it doesn’t matter what you order because everything is made so freshly some from scratch and it’s just an amazing place to go. The staff members that work there are so nice and polite and kind and you can actually have a real conversation with them. To me Madison‘s is a more family bond restaurant. Some of staff that works there has worked there for years even some of them have been there for decades. Madison Cafe is a miniature Raniand Italian restaurant and it’s the best one in town. So if you’ve never been there I would highly recommend you going there and I guarantee you once you’ve been there you will definitely become a regular customer.
 I personally love the fettuccine Alfredo with angel hair pasta that I actually Request them to make it that way for me and they do and it’s no problem no extra charge.. 
I would highly recommend this restaurant to everyone!!!! Believe me it’s worth it!!!!
If you want to go out for a romantic night go there.
If you just want to go out and have a few drinks and some appetizers with girlfriends or work buddies are just friends go there.
No matter what just go there you’re gonna love it as much as I do❤️
Authentic. Upscale but won't break the bank either.  I recommend making a reservation if you plan to eat after 6 pm.

Italian-themed restaurant in downtown Jefferson City offers various meat and pasta dishes, as well as fish-based & some vegetarian options. Service was excellent! The atmosphere was warm & friendly. Food was pretty good, although I thought some of it was a bit salty. (Then again, I don't consume a lot of salt.) Lots of street parking, easy to find. The restaurant space is accessible for most folks, though the front door looks a bit tricky. Family friendly. The bread baskets = carb crack, and arguably the best thing I consumed. I dipped mine in the parmesan garlic olive oil side. I would definitely eat there again.

Additionally: I was there for a work event. It's a great venue for working dinners & group presentations.

She put a group of 4 on the list before is and we were there first. Then they seated them and another group of 4 that came in after them we were still waiting the NBA couple cam they were put on the list and you guessed it WE WERE STILL NOT SEATED AFTER 20 MIN AND BEFORE WE WE BY PASSED FOR A FOURTH TIME WE
 LEFT.  I SURE HOPE ROB READS THIS.they dint deserve even 1 star after the way we were treated tonight VELMA

I tell all my friends and family who live in other states and come to visit me here in Jefferson City that Madison’s is a Jefferson City tradition. The attentive and hard working staff help to accentuate the delicious food. 

From the delicious salads and Appetizers to the succulent and romantic Châteaubriand for two. The food here is a conversation that will be had by families for years to come.

name: Sweet Smoke BBQ
address: 127 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: We LOVE Sweet Smoke and always have a hard time deciding what to order, even our kids eat their whole tray. It’s amazing how quickly you can order and receive your super fresh food even over their very busy lunch hours. So delicious!

Decent barbecue and friendly staff. The parking was nice (mall parking lot).  The restaurant was clean with plenty of seating.  The price was fair for the amount of food you get.  Overall I would recommend this place to anyone wanting good bbq

For a local barbecue place it was pretty good. The staff was friendly and plenty of parking by the mall.  Once we ordered the food came out in about 10 minutes.  Overall the food was good and not overly smoked. The sweet KC barbecue sauce was pretty legit. My overall experience was pretty good and I would recommend anyone to visit

What a gem! Our first time was great.
Old fashioned stand in line and staff brings it to your table. Clean, big portions, a sauce for all tastes, Family friendly AND... What a welcome surprise...a pretty comprehensive bar.
We'll go again.
They've got it right!!!

Absolutely excellent. The burnt ends (at lunch, usually gone by not long after 11:30am) and the slop sandwich definitely rise to the top for me. My wife loves the pulled pork nachos. Top side is definitely the pit beans. A must try. A note on the jalapeno cheese grits, these are usually a favorite for me at most places that have them. Here, I found them to be too liquidy, and not quite what I wanted on the flavor profile either, but still fine. 

All around, this is in my top 10 all-time BBQ places for sure. Maybe not top 5, but definitely top 10. Absolutely the best anywhere between KC and STL for sure. Always worth a stop. Great beers on tap too, and a cool atmosphere. Plus, and this is important on workday lunches, they are quick! Very fantastic, keep up the great work, y'all!

name: Arris' Pizza
address: 117 W High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Great restaurant with awesome pizza and gyros! It's our favorite place to stop when we go through Jefferson City. They've got some Greek decor and murals that are neat. The salad bar is very good with some great choices on it. Staff was attentive and helpful.

Very informal restaurant right across from the State Capitol. Very convenient for us after touring Jefferson City, but I I wouldn't go out of my way to eat there. It has Greek-style salads and sandwiches; pizza and pasta. I had the Greek salad, which was very good. My wife had pizza, which was OK, not great; it lacked enough sauce and the thin crust was tough.

Second time I've eaten here. Pizza is very good. Nice atmosphere. Feels like a family diner. This time I had the meatball sandwich along with the salad bar. Also very good. If I had any negatives it would be the salad bar shuts down a little early. There is a small bar off to the side of the dining room which is also kind of small. I can see where this place could get crowded. A Greek flair with a menu that offers something for everyone.
Wow. I needed a nice place like this. Great food. Literally such a wonderful crispy pizza. I got the gyro meat on it which was a nice touch.

Gyros, pizza and all were awesome!! We got seated right away and wait staff was nice. I even bought something for my mom who is not fond of gyros but she liked it! Think I'll be bringing her there someday!

name: West Main Pizza
address: 1931 W Main St, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: *Friends with gluten intolerance* you can have the cauliflower crust pizza, gluten free cheesey bread sticks and even a gluten free dessert pizza! This place is great. Very casual with a small bar in the back.

I enjoyed the pepperoni and banana pepper pizza I had here.  The crust had a nice crispiness, and the toppings were good.  Order at the counter, and the staff brings the pizza to you when it's ready.  I sat in the bar section; while I had iced tea, it looked like a good place to have a drink. I would go back when in Jefferson City and in the mood for pizza.
Great pizza every visit. Price is well within range, of not cheap, for the quality of food. Often live music entertainment. Full bar, great salads, breadsticks, pizza!
Loved it. Delicious food. Best sub sandwich I've found. Great service.
Great food and very nice place. We are from out of town and just happen across the place glad we did too.

name: Towne Grill
address: 315 Jefferson St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Great breakfast! It’s a little place and they are busy! Worth the wait if you have to wait for a table to open up. Food is great, portions are huge. Get a cinnamon roll before they sell out! If you like philly cheese steaks, you have to get their omelet. It’s sooo good!
Nice little town restaurant. I love the look of this place. Good food, good prices and nice waitresses.
Everything I get is always good, it’s always clean there. And they have a nice staff.
Gloria and Jason our server was fabulous! We always go here for a good deal and great food! I was especially happy to bring team Rubicon for breakfast! Thank you Gloria!
This place is great. It's one of Jefferson City's best. Do yourself a favor and get breakfast here or stop in for lunch.

name: Ecco Lounge
address: 703 Jefferson St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Small place, great food! Several things are homemade, not just frozen off a truck. Service was quick and friendly. I had the pork tenderloin sandwich and it was very good! Definitely go for the waffle fries. If we are ever back in the area, we will return!

We did a huge pick up order. All items were correct except for one set of salad dressing. 

Oh my goodness! The best burger I have had in a very long time. Burger was juicy, perfectly seasoned, lots of mushroom and Swiss. My siblings were all pretty happy with their food, as well. My daughter.did not like her kids burger. We tried it after she refused to eat it. Very bland, absolutely no seasoning, and I couldn't blame her for no wanting to eat it. 

Overall, will definitely be back the next time we are in Jeff City. We might request some seasoning for the kids burger, though!
Every thing is fresh and cooked from scratch. You can taste the difference. Bar food yes, but like you have never had before!!

Very nice environment. Friendly staff and good beers on tap. I was not very thrilled with my food though. Potatoes were overcooked and my chicken was bland, but maybe I was there on a bad night. Presentation was also great.
If your wait staff suggests just a  1/2 orders of onion rings pay attention. Large portions,  and tasty.

name: Domenico's Italian Restaurant
address: 3702 W Truman Blvd # 225, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews:
I've lived in the Jefferson City area most of my adult life, now. I have made it my home. Even so, I've only eaten at Domenico's twice. It isn't a formal experience, but it feels like it should be.  
The food is just that good!
When you first walk in, you're in a very relaxed room. There's a bar, with a TV at each end, but last night the bartender's family was there for dinner,   and he's got the cutest little two year old!
My friend ordered the cheese tortellini with vegetables, I ordered the chicken Alexander, and we ordered baked goat cheese for an appetizer. We both stuck with water to drink.
I have NEVER had bad food from Domenico's. My chicken Alexander was a breast piece perfectly cooked, served in a creamy white wine sauce, and under broccoli, mushrooms, onions, and peppers. The baked goat cheese was served with crisp, crusty bread. It was baked in a bowl of marinara sauce. 
Like I said, I have NEVER had bad food food from Domenico's Italian Restaurant.

Really enjoyed this location. The food was excellent. WHERE'S THE OPTION FOR A 6TH STAR? Anyway. Very prompt, courteous and respectful staff. Glad we saw this restaurant. I would recommend  this location for a more enjoyable dining experience. Your restaurant has a great vibe and format. Keep up the good work!!

We were in area for conference..Excellent food we ordered oysters baked crab cakes steak veal. It was excellent. Best food in Jeff city huge menu..we came from Kansas City will make trip for dinner with group...can’t wait to return.. !!!! Must try. R from KC

The first thing I noticed was the restaurant was hard to see from the main road. It was situated at the back of a retail strip mall. The set-up was nice. The restroom was magnificent. It was extremely clean and it smelled wonderful. The entire front of the restaurant was clean!

I ordered seafood ravioli. It was warm, rich, and exquisite. I also had a side order of vegetables. They were seasoned, crisp, and succulent. My colleague had the King Crab and she truly enjoyed it. My only concern was our server. She could have been more attentive .

Food, service, atmosphere, mostly top-notch! We had a positive experience and I would definitely eat here again. It was a little pricey and the side of broccoli I had was a little off tasting, but that could have totally been a fluke. If you are in town or nearby I recommend making a stop and trying the place out for yourself. Next time I pay a visit I’ll try a few other menu items and see if I need to award that fifth star. Lastly, the drinks we ordered were pretty strong so that was another plus.

name: Das Stein Haus
address: 1436 Southridge Dr, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Great local restaurant. Can be cozy or crazy. Tonight was great, not hurried, food was perfect.  And bananas fosters for a great finish to the evening

From the moment  you come to that restaurant  the personel give you a good feeling. Very comfortable team, it is a friendly place to hang out with buddies or with your date. enjoyable  food, qualified  chef, decent  price and generous  service. Warmly recommended.
This is amazing, homemade food! The potatoes tasted just like my grandma's. It choked me up a little bit. You don't find food this good anywhere, anymore.

Had dinner there Christmas Eve with my family. It is a small and privately owned establishment. Food and service were excellent. However, I did notice the ladies bathroom is in need of renovation. The bathroom functioned fine, just needs some new wallpaper or paint.

A very pleasant place to have a date night.

My favorite thing about this restaurant is its vintage authenticity.  It just feels like the kind of place that's been around for decades and the food improves with each decade.

This is the most authentic German food in the area and maybe even more so than places in Hermann, MO.  It's about the experience and the owner/cook makes sure of that from beginning of meal to end.

My wife and I have enjoyed everything we've tried here so far.

Must try desserts are the Bananas Foster and the Cherry Jubilee.

name: Hunan Restaurant
address: 1416 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Delicious food and service. Quite popular, so you may have to wait. Totally worth it!
Great lunch menu and prices. Food is always very good and super fresh.
I actually like their dishes and customer service, excellent area next to my house. The employees are always super friendly. I highly recommend this place.
Good food, service, and prices. Quaint establishment with a charming Oriental theme.

I dine on Chinese dishes most of my life and have learned to cook many Chinese dishes as well.  The soups here are terribly disappointing and ridiculously priced for less than a cup.  Menu said $1.75 but got charged for $2.50.  I guess that's very telling already for the rest of the pricing reviews too.  Sizzling beef was good though, and served with scallions.  Im also glad they served free hot tea as this is a true Chinese restaurant tradition.

name: Colton's Steak House & Grill
address: 2415 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: The trail potatoes. Potato skins are my favorite. I ask for too many sauces but they are always happy to get whatever I need. Prices are great. Drinks are great. Staff is great, always have a positive smile when when their really busy..
Great restaurant! Excellent service, a very pleasant waitress, delicious food. Loved it!

This place is always packed, but it moves fast, so not a lot of waiting. We ate at the bar our last go, and the bar tender (forgot his name) was awesome as a server!  He took all 4 of our orders and one with special instructions- without writing it down, and nailed it! Food was good as usual. Watched a couple different games on the TVs but usually sit in a booth which are comfortable.

Omg, if we could give 10 stars we would!! On our date night, tonight Friday March 8, 2019 & our server Brandy rocks!! She did her thing... she was very very polite, observant, very respectful, got our meals right & out in excellent timing. She spoke clear, great attitude & with a smile!!  WE WILL BE BACK AGAIN!!!! 🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 🌟🌟❤❤❤❤❤
Food was fantastic, steak was cooked great, wait staff was very attentive. The manager even came over and talked to us. Very Very great

name: Bandana's Bar-B-Q and Catering
address: 2336 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Always great service! Great price on kids meals and they tend to get about as much food as an adult plate so there’s always leftovers for the next day’s lunch. Great tasting food! Our favorite is the lunch chicken plate with baked beans! Food is served fast and is always hot, never have I been served a plate that has been sitting in the back forever getting cold.
Best rib I've ever had.   Great portions at a very reasonable price.  Smoked Turkey was great as well. Service was outstanding as well

My go to every time I am in Jefferson City, MO. For a small town this location has superior customer service and the food orders are processed at a fast pace. Very friendly and efficient. I highly recommend this location. Ribs are to die for and the bread, my goodness the bread whoa.... it’s just too delicious for words.
My favorite BBQ place in all of America...yes I have eaten ALOT of BBQ

Had the smoked turkey dinner it was great!!!would have loved to try out mora things but im passing thru but would definitely pass by again to try something new,the only thing was they do not have much variety of beer selections which is why i rate this 4stars but the staff is great always checking on you nothing bad to say.

name: O'Donoghue's Steaks and Sea Food
address: 900 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: The hand-breaded shrimp were very good and substantial in size--the batter was a bit darker than I like. My only other issue is that the salad had too many stems, but was otherwise good; the homemade Thousand Island was very good.If you orders dessert, the brownie with ice cream is a good choice. Service was a tad slow, but efficient and friendly.
All I can say about this place is that it's AMAZING!!!

This was a meal that will not soon be forgotten.  It was our first visit and I'm positive it will turn out to be the first of many.  The food was absolutely sublime.  The service was professional, attentive, and friendly.  The decor was classy and the atmosphere was intimate.  I very highly recommend that you make a point of giving O'Donoghue's a try.  You will not regret it.
Went with a large group. Gratuity was not inclined which was nice. The food was awesome. They had good gluten free options
Great service and fantastic food.

name: Alexandros
address: 2125 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: The service this evening was outstanding! Our server was very knowledgeable and very patient with questions about the menu. She was very attentive to our needs.  My New Orleans shrimp pasta was delicious, very flavorful but not spicy. My husband's steak was cooked to perfection. We haven't been here in a number of years but will definitely be back very soon!

Best Prime Rib & Kansas City Strip Steak in town!

Good Caesar salad and good sides.

Delicious Creme Brulee dessert.

Nice restaurant atmosphere.

Can accommodate large groups or a nice dinner date for party of two.

Helpful and friendly service.
Prime rib w Alexandros topping is Amazing here!! Service is great, wonderful place to come and dine...
Outstanding! Great food and amazing service by Janelle! Will definitely be back. Highly recommend for anyone who appreciates exceptional food!

A high-class Place, good for celebration such as birthdays and graduations, but also great just for impressing a date. The food is excellent, and if anything is not right they will make it right for you. The wait staff is well trained and you never have to wait for someone to fill your glass. The atmosphere is excellent. If you like lobster tail they have a wonderful fried lobster tail that will make your mouth orgasm

name: Love Sushi
address: 2201 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: The sushi is great for the midwest. Having had Korean sushi for many years the quality definitely  isn't  as great. But again, great for somewhere so far from any oceans.
Went for Valentine's dinner.   Very crowded,  but staff handled well.   Food was absolutely delicious!  Waiter was extremely courteous, did a great job.

Excellent, as always! We really enjoy eating here. Great atmosphere and staff! If there is a better sushi restaurant in the area I have not heard of it. I had the Jefferson City roll and the King Salmon roll. Definitely give this place a try!

It was my first time here and I enjoyed it. I had the Oh My plate recommended to me by a family member, and wasn't told that it arrived in flames. Spectacular! And tasty! Helpful and friendly staff. I enjoy Asian cuisine and was not disappointed.

Korean music videos on the TV. Friendly staff. Flaming rolls. Takoyaki and Korean menu items. 

Birthday song includes lasers and a hat.

name: La Chica Loca
address: 306 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Been here twice and each time the food has been amazing.  Delicious chicken and waffles, and the surf (minus the turf) burrito of the week was almost to die for (almost as I live to tell the tale!)  ;)  The restaurant is new and chic.  My partner was thoroughly impressed with the plywood flooring.  There is local art adorning the walls, some of which you can purchase if you are interested.  Always clean!!!!  One cannot say that about every eatery anywhere.  Always a seat available, even when they're busy, and the service is top notch and quick.  If you have not visited you are missing out on one of JC's newest and best eateries in town!
Food was fantastic. Owner is awesome. The chili was one of the best I have ever had. Spicy, flavorful and filling.

This is the best breakfast (and they’re open through lunch too) in Jefferson City! Flavor perfection. Awesome variety of breakfast burritos or bowls. Your taste buds will thank you!
My favorite is the house made chicken chorizo.

Freaking amazing. Pretty unique restaurant idea. Started out as a restaurant until it collapsed, turned into a food truck until a tornado took it out, now is a cute little spot downtown. 

The green chili one is phenomenal. No matter what skip the salsa and go with the aioli on it. 

Owners are incredibly nice and super passionate about  their craft as well. 

They do a few lunch specials and I hope they get more once they get settled in! 

Good stuff.

Really good burritos and amazing variety.  I've had 5 different burritos so far, and have yet to be disappointed.  My favorite so far is the chicken chorizo burrito.  Make sure you get the spicy aioli - it's really good.

name: Nick's Family Restaurant
address: 1507 E McCarty St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews:
Fun and nostalgic restaurant experience inside the Jefferson City airport building.

Good fish sandwich and good slaw and fantastic green beans.  Good fish and shrimp plate.

Service is good but maybe under staffed for the lunch rush.

First visit to this recommended eatery.  Arrived at 5pm on a Friday and was given our choice of seating.  Very friendly and informative staff guided us through the options on the menu.  Very informal and unpretentious.  We had the best feast of the week here and portions will not make you asking for more but if you did you would pleasantly accommodated.  Will be returning anytime we are looking to dine in Jefferson City. By the time we left there was a wait for a table.
Very fast, and friendly. Great service all the way around!
You go to Nick's for that heavenly fried chicken. The sides are just ok, but that chicken is on point. If you like fried chicken then you'll like Nick's.
Very good fried chicken and green beans.  The slaw was mostly vinegar which I don’t like but the other guy did.

name: Dragon Kitchen
address: 2219 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: This place is awesome! They have a really good selection of food, and every time I have been here it has been hot and fresh. The staff is always very friendly and accommodating, also very attentive. I have yet to have a bad experience and I've been here dozens of times in the last few months. Five stars, and thank you!
Great variety of food! And looked very clean! Staff was also very friendly and was not too crowded so you can enjoy a good meal without too many people around. Pricing was reasonable.

We have been eating here for 20 years. Food is very good, always fresh and service is great. It is a buffet, but they have a menu for a la cart. No matter how busy they are you will have a minimal wait. I highly recommend.

I happened to go at the right time - shortly after 6pm. Food was fresh and there was plenty of it. The food was good. However, the service was lacking. They seemed eager to refill water but not soda. The drinks with all the ice barely hold 8oz of beverage. Their dinner theater was relatively "amateur," as small children kept running in and out of the kitchen, who knows I guess they could have been on break. Worse yet, one of the urchins had a drink cup bigger than mine. I took pity on him though, for his was empty and I assume it was his playtime/break after all.

Very friendly greeters and waiters, the food was hot and fresh, delicious and tasty array of choices to eat. Fresh vegetables grilled and baked and fried protein to meet the needs of even the pickiest eaters. My family and I would definitely patronize this establishment over and over again. One of the most friendliest cleanest and tastiest Chinese restaurants in town.

name: LongHorn Steakhouse
address: 3545 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews:
The overall experience was ok. Three points because the presentation and the waiter were not good. You can know what I mean by presentation by looking at the stakes in the picture; That’s how plates were served. 

The t-bone was ordered medium-rare, but it was well-done.. both orders were a little bit over cooked. 

After bringing the check and signing it, the waiter took it before we leave. That’s rude and definitely not professional. The norm is not to collect the signed receipt until after the customer leaves.

Service was excellent. We had an exceptional waitress. That food was delicious and the presentation was perfect. Our table had everything from steaks to seafood.  Everyone enjoyed their supper with no compliments.  Drinks were refreshed without having to ask. Our waitress timing fro our salads, food and drinks were excellent.  Excellent service for a chain restaurant.  I would recommend this establishment and patronize the steakhouse again.

The food was great .... The appetisers and the entrees were both delicious,with ample variety of side options. Our server was very good and attentive. Little high on the cost parameter but if budget is not a thing for you then go in for good food and drinks.

We arrived at 2:00 pm and we’re seated right away, even though the place was busy. Our waiter, Will, was EXTREMELY personable, knowledgeable, and friendly! I told my daughter he should do commercials for them, since he was so enthusiastic about his job! Wonderful service = wonderful tip! Great food!
Very good place to eat. Fun atmosphere!! Everyone nice & friendly. Food was exellent!! Will go back every chance I get. Love this place!!!

name: LOVE2NOURISH
address: 700 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Wow! I’ve been want to try this place for a while and I’m so glad I did. It’s quick and delicious! I walked in, grabbed a meal and was back at my office in 10 minutes. Usually you think of healthy meals as bland but this is bursting with flavor. I’m excited to go back.
Always a wonderful experience, I got to try the new citrus coconut amazeballs. They are wonderful.

I have several food allergies, and suffer from Celiac Disease. Finding healthy options beyond the grocery store is a trial for me. But Love2Nourish has a HUGE variety of really good meals that I can eat without worry! Thank you so much, Laurel, for all the hard work you do in providing such great cuisine!

Great locally sourced food. The owners have been very helpful during the recent tornado relief, providing free food and drink to those affected and volunteering their time to restoring the city. Great people who deserve your business.

I have had many great meals at the restaurant; however, this review is geared more towards their meal prep and my fantastic interactions with Laurel. In Jeff City, there is a void for healthy/clean eating. Love 2 Nourish changed the game for me in a dramatic way. Their food is always delicious with great portion sizes, reasonably priced, and so convenient. They deliver the meals straight to your door.

Laurel is honestly a saint and provides the best service. Every email I ever send is responded to personally. They always go above and beyond and I am extremely impressed with the company overall with Laurel as the main representative that I've worked with.

name: Lutz's BBQ
address: 3505 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews:
I had their 1/2 porksteak basket with jalapeno homemade chips for $8.25.

The meat was smoked, tender and scrumptious!  Their homemade chips are delicious and you get a choice of 12 seasonings.  I had jalapeno and it was not real hot/spicy.

The food is great.  You order at the counter and pay.  They call your name when your food is ready.

This is smokin' delicious BBC.  Straight 5 star in my humble opinion ! !

My company was hired to assist a couple with coordinating their wedding day last weekend, and I had the most pleasant experience working with the team from Lutz's. The communication leading up to the wedding was top notch; Kala was incredibly upbeat and helpful. It made both me and the bride feel incredibly confident that the end product would be stellar. On the day of the wedding, the Lutz's team was welcoming, helpful, and flexible. I thoroughly enjoyed their energy, and it was great to have them enhance the guest experience. Oh, did I mention that the food was tasty? Thank you all for everything; looking forward to working future weddings with you!
Decent enough BBQ, quick, fairly priced.

When is the last time you ate bbq at a gas station? This place is always hopping over the lunch hour, so get here early. I recommend the burt ends sandwich and the homemade potato chips. Throw a little creamy coleslaw on that sandwich and you’ve got yourself a winner- pickles and onions on the side. Nothing fancy here, just great food.

Food was great. We got the pulled pork sandwich and the burnt ends sandwich meal with baked beans and fries. It was $21.35 all together. The lady that took our order was very nice and super helpful. The food came pretty darn quick for a BBQ place even though they were packed. It was a bit pricey though as we got the 1/3 sandwiches and not the 1/2. All in all a.good place for some good food we will be back. 😃

name: The Pizza Company
address: 1508 E McCarty St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Was one of my favorite places to eat until it switched owners. Staff can be very rude on phone and in person. They can lack professionalism. Was very disappointed with my experiences lately and has cost The Pizza Company my business. Super sad :(
Great crust, bunch of toppings, Coca-Cola, Coke, cool people, video games & pool table downstairs, will go back very soon! YUM!

We had our family Thanksgiving here,  20 to 25 people.  4 of us found hair in the pizza and salad.  When we told the waitress her reply was "really? What color was the hair?".  Went to pay and no apology,  comp or anything. Never going back.
Ever have really good day old cold pizza? This pizza company has accomplished just that! So imagine how great it is when it comes out hot.

This place is a local favorite, the busiest time to stop in is around lunch, but I would still say that is the time to go if you like buffet pizza.  Grab a table, get a plate and drink, and pay at the register when you are finished.  Pretty much self serve during lunch. The only challenge you might have is navigating the lines between the waves of people getting in line for fresh pizza as it comes up.   They have changed the layout of the dinning area a little to accommodate more people so finding a table seems to be a little easier.  If you have large groups give them a call, they might be able to work you into a private area down stairs.

name: Oscar's Classic Diner
address: 2118 Schotthill Woods Dr, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Amazing onion rings! Great service and delicious dinner style food. Cant go wrong with any item on the menu. Definitley a frequent spot for my wife and me.
It was good as always.  We had breakfast.  We ordered the Biscuits & Gravy Deluxe and Ham & Cheese Omelette. Both were good and large portions. Even had extra to take home.

We have enjoyed the great service and food many times. Whole family is able to find something to eat. Gluten free menu includes cake! Very impressed with their ability to please my family's diverse needs. McKenzie was an excellent waitress. She took care of our needs perfectly!
Food was excellent! Their made on-site potato chips are like packaged chips but not greasy or salty. Be sure to get them a try. Arrived at noon Saturday and got seated immediately 👍
Came in on a busy Saturday night and was seated immediately. The server came over in perfect time taking our order and drinks. Food came in less than ten minutes. Best restaurant I’ve been too.

name: Arris' Bistro & Liquid Lounge
address: 409 W Miller St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews:
Wonderful atmosphere with indoor seating and outdoor patio seating.

Must try fries and ranch dipping sauce.

Tasty Caesar Salad. 

Exceptional Mediterranean Wrap.

Wonderful Tuscan Alfredo Panini.

Some of the best desserts in Jefferson City.  The Strawberry Float Cake has been my favorite so far. 

Excellent cocktails.

Great service. 

Nice location right off the highway.

I have not ate there yet...from what I have seen the setting is causal, the customers are all enjoying ample amounts of their lunches. It looks quite delicious. The restrooms are very clean major bonus. The desserts OMGosh!!! They are to die for. I swear I gained 10#s just from looking at them. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
The food is good.  Needs up date-refresh for decor.  More  training  for staff with new technology for payments.  Staff is nice, but need more staff to handle customers. Give dessert menus.

I've stopped by here a handful of times on my way through Jefferson City, always well worth it.

Nice selection of beers on tap, huge assortment of delicious food from the well-known Arris's family tradition, and a large beautiful desert case with homemade truffles to pop in a go box for the road!

Stop by here for a wonderful lunch or a fantastic dinner, you will not be disappointed!
All our food was great, but I think I just had the best Caesar Salad ever!! It was so good! The lasagna was really tasty, too. I didn't get a dessert, but they looked superb!

name: Fuji Japanese Steak House & Sushi Bar
address: 3600 Country Club Dr Ste 512, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews:
West Coast transplant and this is probably the closest thing to Edible Sushi that reminds me of a Real Sushi restaurant in the Entirety of Missouri.
Great Place if you actually know what Sushi should be and how to eat it!!

PS - Would really appreciate Uni on the menu !!!!!

Nice service and tasty food. 

We enjoyed the dining experience in the restaurant section.

I recommend the sashimi salad and special sushi roll with mango.

The sushi was good. I didn't much care for one of the rolls (it had mango on top) but overall they were great. The presentation of our dish was beautiful! I loved the ambient lighting and general atmosphere of the place. Our server was very attentive and our drinks never went dry. The prices were reasonable, competitive with other sushi restaurants. I really would like to try their hibachi next time.

I’ve been here before but this was my first time with my kids. Had a blast. Even though two of my four kids are scaredy-cats, the chef got them interested and out from under the table. 
The food was delicious and service was fabulous!
The atmosphere is neat and the food is good. It’s a pretty typical hibachi grill. A little pricey.

name: Chick-fil-A
address: 3407 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: I don’t know what changed since they first opened....  I wasn’t a fan then, but I’ve been there a half a dozen times since then and it’s been wonderful.  The Spicy Chicken Deluxe will make you talk to yourself.  👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

I've been to this location several times since moving to town.. they seem to have way bigger breakfast burritos than the location in independence, mo. Best fast food customer service around.. aaaaand great food
Best sandwich I've ever had, definitely lives up to the hype.
The Best chicken sandwiches  in town. Always fresh. I have been a couple of times and the ice cream machine was broke each time.  They should keep  it fixed because their ice cream is awesome.
Love Chick-fil-a! Consistently the best run restaurants no matter where you go!  Best chicken ever!

name: Theo's Midtown
address: 620 W McCarty St, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Flavorful to the full! Easy walking distance from our hotel! Friendly wait staff. Many menu options for all tastes and GF options too! The bar and bar menu looked enticing! The atmosphere was fun and elegant. Will return soon!!
Great food and atmosphere.  Really glad we stopped here for lunch.  The service was fantastic.  I had a gyro and my friend the Cuban and we both loved our meal.

Excellent! Love this place. Their customer service and food is always amazing. Great vibe! We brought our national, regional and state officers for Zeta Phi Beta Sorority, Inc. there two weeks ago to dine and now they are addicted and will only eat here when they come in town for meetings. So once again we are here today. Thanks for providing a great dining experience every time.

I guess we lucked out that it wasn't crowded on a Friday night. Great service, and they have hooks under the table for a purse! (#thelittlethings) 
We tried the Mad Rooster pizza and it was pretty good. It's not what we'd usually get but it's quite spicy. The crust actually reminds me of a breakfast pizza crust and the garlic cream sauce was delicious. The wine was so good but overpriced. I can buy it here locally for the price they'd charge for two small glasses.
This is a great place to go for lunch. The food was fresh and delicious. The service was excellent and very friendly.

name: MOD Pizza
address: 1709 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Today was good. I did an online order and it was ready when they said it would be and everything was correct.  The pizza was very good, thin and crispy with all the toppings I wanted. My salad was fresh and I love that I can get whatever vegetables I want in it. I gave 4 stars because I've been there before and had a couple of issues with burnt pizza and incorrect orders.

1st time I have tried the cauliflower crust. And 1st time I have ever been able to build my own without a large upcharge.
BEST PIZZA EVER!!!
Even had roasted garlic pieces!!!!
Love this place. Always great service. Fast and delicious. Every time I come in, they are freindly and fast. Never had a bad experience here.

It was my first time, and it was a success.  Design your own pizza, who doesn't love that?  There were lots of toppings from which to chose.  The staff was helpful and the place was clean. The price was good.  I would come back.

I love MOD pizza. It is refreshing to be able to design your own special pizza without paying extra for toppings. Always delicious and the staff are always friendly and helpful. The only reason this restaurant does not get 5 ⭐️rating is the volume of the music they play. Another new restaurant where the music is so loud you can’t carry on a conversation. ( Must be for people who just want to play on their phones.) We usually get ours to go for just this reason. But the pizza is great!

name: Manuel's Taqueria
address: 2403 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: The tacos tasted great!  Prices are very reasonable.  I would have given 5 stars but the restroom definitely needed help especially at opening time.

Coming from a Hispanic, this is hands down the best place in Jeff City to get authentic Mexican food. The menu has a great variety of food and drinks to chose from, and the serving sizes are very generous. You won't be disappointed!
Now talk about soft tacos, you have to order some from this ace. You may need help with one as they are extralarge indeed and yummy
Great food and friendly staff the prices are pretty decent for the amount of food you get. Authentic Mexican not the same as what you're used to around here.
This place has great authentic Mexican food and I highly recommend anyone to try it. The serving sizes are also very large. Even the quesadillas are impressively filling.

name: The Water Tower Bar & Grill
address: 458 Rock Hill Rd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Good food. Never crazy crowded. We like to play pool and shuffleboard. Threw darts the last time we were there, too. Menu has grown since they opened. Pub food, nothing fancy. But the skirt burger is fun! Tenderloin is huge! Thursday night is trivia... I think they are still trying to grow a following for this as there were only 3 teams, but the questions were a very good mix and it was a lot of fun. I hope they continue to do that. Definitely one of our "go to" spots in Jeff City!
The food was delicious! The place is nice, but nothing fancy. The menu is limited but still a decent selection. Definitely worth checking out.
The staff is super friendly here. The drinks came out quick and we had a great time playing pool here. The food was tasty too.
Great place, good atmosphere. Wonderful place to throw darts. Sidenote, they don't have a very good alternative menu. No keto/Gluten free options that I saw on the menu.

Open seating bar and grill with a solid burger. Macrobrew selection with a small craft selection in cans, plus large liquor offering. Mature crowd, friendly staff. Great place to grab a beer, burger, and conversation. 2 pool tables and shuffleboard, plus live bands on occasion.

name: Paddy Malone's Pub
address: 700 W Main St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Always love coming here on out traditional Thursday nights! Black and Bleu burger is the best in town and possibly the state! Mike takes great care of us and Tom cooks one hell of a meal. You'd never know you feel more at home than you when you do here!

Great Irish Pub restaurant with indoor seating at tables, booths, or bar, & outdoor seating at covered deck. 

Good menu with ginormous portions of food.  The pork loin sandwich was ridiculous and delicious.  The cheese steak sandwich was amazing.  The Magner’s hard cider was tasty.

Can’t find food like this anywhere else in town.

Friendly service.

Seems like it’s always busy, but we got immediate seating.

Street parking in front or along side street.

Food is phenomenal. The cheese steak soup is some of the best soup I’ve ever had. Burgers are amazing! Chips and cheese are soooooo good and big enough to share. Guinness beer is one of the best pours you’ll find in the US. Chicken strips are handed-breaded. Be prepared for a wait and less that stellar service - but it is *so* worth it.

Stopped in to get a sandwich and a beer, we certainly were not disappointed! The portebella mushrooms were outstanding ! The O rings looked delicious although we did not try them. Enjoyed their beer selections and the atmosphere of the establishment! Will definitely go back!
I like this place. They have among the best food. If you show up for a drink. Make sure you have an empty belly. Order some food for and your Friend. The Irish way😋

name: JQ's On High
address: 911 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews:
I called in for food to go last week. Presentation was great and the store was clean as always. These guys are awesome! Keep up the good work. The Hellz Bella Burger Add bacon is my all time favorite. No Actual meat(other than bacon) Its AMAZING! 
Thanks again!

Jeff City is sooooo lucky to have JQ’s, never a bad experience. Everything is so fresh and the quaint atmosphere just adds to the whole experience. It helps with the lunch staff just knows your order. We LOVE JQ’s!

I'm surprised I've never eaten here before, and if anyone has told me about it, I must not have been listening.  A simple menu where the attention to detail is placed on the flavor and preparation of the food.  The staff member that took our order was very helpful and courteous.  Even though this night was rather slow and there were plenty of available seats, we opted to sit next door at The Mission where they had open mic night going on. They walked our order right over and delivered it to our table.  That's pretty cool.  

We ordered the burger and the fish tacos. The burger was good sized, placed on a toasted bun with onions, lettuce, tomatoes and pickles. I also had them add jalapenos.  There was a sauce added on the underside which was flavorful but didnt dominate the taste of the burger.  It was cooked evenly through and the burger itself had good taste and wasn't dried out or overly greasy. 

The fish tacos had a good amount of fish and the tastes and texture worked out great.  Nothing seemed over cooked or lacking seasoning. 

If your like supporting your local businesses and like your food cooked to order, you should deffinitly try it.

This is a great burger joint and more! I have enjoyed talking with the owners as much as having their burgers too! I want to try everything on the menu at least once but it's hard to move past those big, juicy, wonderful tasting chopped brisket works of art!

Food was great especially the baked beans. They were an upcharge though. My grandson  took me there he loves the burgers. They were pricey but well worth it. Staff was awesome.  Will go again for sure

name: Daisy Delight Restaurant
address: 2715 E McCarty St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: This place is ok. I'm guessing the high stars are because it's a local dive and there's really not much else around to choose from. It's exactly what you think it is, greasy diner food. Burgers, chili fries, nachos, mozzarella sticks, etc. It wasn't bad but I won't be going back. Drive another 5 minutes towards Jefferson City and you'll have several far better options to choose from.
Amazing service friendly atmosphere great for any occasion.   I love this place!!
really quaint cozy authentic Americana dinner feeling. very nostalgic, the food was outstanding and portions were beyond fair👍🏼
Nice, old fashioned place. Best of all it is the only place I know of in the area with lactose free ice cream!
I enjoyed their fried mushrooms. They also have a working Ms Pacman arcade game!!

name: J Vietnamese Cafe
address: 1406 Missouri Blvd ste c, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Always fantastic food and service. The shrimp Curry was great today.
This is my favorite place to eat.  I absolutely love the Pho.  It's way more than I can eat, but it's impossible to stop myself.
Unique, well crafted presentation.  Everything I've ordered here has been excellent in both flavor and presentation.  I really enjoy the boba tea, it's like a sweet smoothie with speed bumps.
Great, food, atmosphere and service!

So glad we found this place! We moved here from Washington state a few years back and hadn't found a place for Pho because we live in a smaller town here in MO.  We've found it now! Service was perfect, food was delicious, and atmosphere was inviting.  Really enjoyed it and will for sure go back when we are in Jeff city!

name: Kate & Ally's Ny Pizzeria
address: 1418 Missouri Blvd A, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Local go-to for pizza 🍕. They have a great lunch special with a huge slice of pizza and a salad. Even with a soda it’s less than you spend at a fast food place.  Fantastic pizza!

Got a med supreme St.Louis style, it was my fault I forgot to say no to provalone cheese and not a big fan of large green pepper, no sub unless you pay 1.85 more, now I wish I would have, crust was spot on and sauce was very good, sausage good flavor,
I had this place a while ago and the pizza and design was amazing I also really like the salad’s  and wings keep up the great work!

excellent place to dine in and enjoy some great food especially the Chicago style deep dish pizza. We are from Chicago and we rate it 9 out of 10 Stars with its only comparison is actually in Chicago....❤❤❤❤❤. Petite dish pizza was so good that we ate one there and ordered an additional one chest to take home........

Best pizza I've ever had... And I only tried the New York style pepperoni, the other pizzas my friends ordered look amazing and they were all pleased as well! Kind and generous owner, saw her compassion first hand with a "down on their luck" local.

name: Sabaai-Sabaai Thai Cuisine
address: 219 Madison St #3229, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: I have grown up eating a lot of Thai food, so I am particular that it be authentic... I was a little skeptical at first of this restaurant, but I have now decided that it is the best Thai food that I've tried, outside of Thailand. The customer service was great, and the prices were good. I will definitely be going back again, and again!

I had a shrimp Pad See U and kaeng panamg curry. The food is very authentic and yummy! The price is reasonable and the staffs were kind and welcoming. I would def stop by here again. Those who are looking for some authentic flavor would love the place!

I don't understand where they got their good reviews...

Twice I've ordered from them, to be delivered,  and both times the entree was bland, lacking in flavor and desperately needing salt. Both times my drink had been spilled a bit inside the bag. Who puts the drinks in the bag, and why? Both times our appetizers were wrapped with paper towels, which gets soggy and becomes glued to the pot stickers, dumplings or whatever. Unless   I'm desperate for Thai, I dont think I'll buy from them again.

Tried shrimp pad Thai, beef pad won sen, and chicken yellow curry....along with shrimp dumplings. Honestly didn’t like any of it and would not recommend this restaurant. Ordered a take out order and it took over 35 min to prepare. Had high hopes based on other reviews but was very disappointed. We did not finish a single dish. 

Food was bland and of poor quality. Wanted to love it but it was awful.
6 STARS!! Amazing authentic Thai food with the best service in Jefferson City. Highly recommend!

name: Veit's Pub & Grill
address: 2314 Lorenzo Greene Dr, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews:
Exceptionally good comfort foods!

Great menu choices and a lunchtime buffet that is full of great home style cookin’.

They also have a bar. 

Helpful and friendly service.

Restaurant / sports bar atmosphere with TVs mounted at various locations around the room tuned-in to the game. 

Pass the time with friends at outdoor seating areas with beanbag games.

Wow! Easter family dinner was outstanding! A man at Missouri Native Plants Nursery recommended Veit's mentioning the catfish. It was delicious. Great patio with small stream next to it. Our server was fairly new but she took care of us. You should eat here if you are in the Jefferson City area.
We went to Veit's for the first time a couple of weeks ago. Although the buffet was almost ending, all their food was hot and fresh! Definitely about to be a regular there.
What Great food. Plenty of good food. Great off the menu. Great off the Food Bar. Spacious for large Groups. Timely arrival if Hot Food. Friendly Servers
I have only been there for lunch and went 3 times.  Food is okay.  But the lunch buffet is exactly the same every day.  Be nice if they changed it up a bit.  I would definitely go more often.

name: Pancheros Mexican Grill
address: 2208 Missouri Blvd #100, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Always fast and fresh. Even the tortillas are fresh pressed and cooked there in front of you. And I have never seen a more beautifully wrapped burrito in my life.
Freshly made tortillas, good quality toppings, and decent prices. Feels healthier than fast food, taste better too.

Everything is nice and neat and clean. The staff is very helpful. Everything is made Fairly fresh and it's extremely delicious. options are limited but by just adding or subtracting some of the dishes you can make a great combination. Even my children who are very fussy eaters love this place. Everything is very affordable and you will leave full. This is a great place for those who are on a limited budget because you can make one meal into two if you have to.

I was given a free burrito and chips card and decided to use it today for lunch. I went in and had no idea how to order since I have never been there. They were very nice and helpful. I told them what meat and told them to just make something yummy. That burrito was huge first off. Second it was absolutely amazing. I suggest everyone give them a try. You wont be disappointed.
The staff here is amazing! Very friendly and helpful.

name: El Espolon
address: 450 Rock Hill Rd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: The food was good. The service was ok.  The server hardly came to our table.

Looks really good. A little off the beaten path. Bought gift cards where the manager was accommodating and didn't mind I was asking for 35 individual cards. They have a separate bar area. Once lunch crowd where I overheard best place in town. If you've not been there, this is a must visit to try it out for yourself

We went Friday night and had a bad experience. We waited a hour and a half . Still no food. We just walked out and they chased after us to pay for my soda. I am sorry but if I sit there that long with no explanation I am not paying for anything. We will not be going back. I just called and was going to give them a chance to make it right but he acted like it was my fault. So if this is they way they treat there guests then I will definitely not be returning.

First time visit. I'm giving 2 stars only due to their lack of consideration toward customers health. 
While dining, they proceeded in sweeping floors within very close proximity of customers tables. I'm confident that state health department laws and regulations would consider this a health violation. Have they no knowledge of the dust and airborne pathogens they cause to be stirred and distributed. 
Food, service, quality and quantities were proportionate, with the food being tasteful and fresh, just hope they review customer reviews and make the necessary changes toward customers safety.

Honestly some of the best Mexican Food I've had in a while! Visiting from out of town, and tried to find anywhere that was open, 4th place we tried and we are so glad we stopped here!!
Fast, friendly service, delicious chips and salsa, and the food was hot and so so good! Would definitely return and recommend!!

name: Bones Restaurant and Lounge
address: 210 Commercial Ave, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: When I first walked in I had a really low standards the atmosphere was of a really older crowd the carpet and decor is aged. However, once we were sit down I listen to the music being played on the piano by an older man which was amazing he did a fantastic job our server was super nice and the food was absolutely amazing!! This place is absolutely one of those don’t judge a book by its cover!!
Delicious food, great service!
We had a class reunion there. Food was outstanding.  The best German pot roast I've ever eaten.  Atmosphere was perfect for our group of 50people.  Staff was attentive and friendly.  Loved it.
My grandparents Jennie and Russell Hill were regulars here many years ago. I love the food and good company!
We were in the banquet room. Very nice. Lots of seating. Everything seemed clean and staff was nice.

name: El Jimador Mexican Restaurant
address: 1410 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Just as good as I remember from nearly 20 years ago. A great place to eat while you're in town with fast and friendly service. I'm glad to see this place is still going strong. Keep up the great work.
Great service and food!  Really cool pottery drinking glasses, $7!

The food was good. Very quick but our waiter came to our table once after our food came out. We needed drinks and he was no where to be found. Also it was my Birthday and my husband told the hostess that it was my birthday and they didn't do anything. I didn't mind that so much but he was upset because she said they would. He even had us sit there a little longer after we were done eating. The food I would go back for... the service would make me try another place.
Really good, well seasoned Mexican food. A nice selection of salsas at their salsa bar.
Awesome food!!! ... me and my family moved from Fresno California ware it's real Mexican food and this place makes me feel like home! ... HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!!

name: El Espolon
address: 915 Eastland Dr E, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: It doesn’t matter how many times I go here, it’s the same dismissive attitude and horrible customer service. The waiters are usually pleasant, it’s the managers. Literally asked a questions about the menu before placing my phone order. The man huffed blurted out the answer then placed me on hold to take another order. I know because he didn’t even put the phone on mute. It’s sad that this small community can’t get good consistent customer service. And when concerns about food you ARE PAYING for are brought to managements attentions. They just look at you. Don’t say I apologize, I will speak with blank. Or we will fix for next time. You get nothing but a blank look. And I’ve gotten FOOD POISONING twice from this place. I swore I wouldn’t eat here again. It’s been a year and I thought Let me try it one more time and BOOM Still no change. I hope they read these and do take into consideration peoples feeling because talking to them doesn’t work.
Nice restaurant with friendly and attentive staff. The chips are hot and fresh

Ordered take out of a chicken taco salad and got 20%salad and 80% sour cream when I called to see if I could just get it replaced with chicken nachos something my 2 year old brother could assemble correctly they would not replace it nor help in anyway, and the icing on the cake was I’ve been sitting on the toilet for the past hour think I have food poisoning. Also another time I told a waiter to have a good one and got called a pendeho what ever that means will not return

We went to dinner here on a Saturday night. Place was pretty crowded but still got seated quickly. The waitress got our drink order then. We ordered a short while later then waited an hour for food. When the food came out it was cold. On top of that they forgot to bring my brother in law's food. It was another 15 minutes before we could flag the manager over. They finally bright his food out. It was cold as well.  I do not recommend this place and we will never go back.
Big menu. Great food and service. Place is huge. You could fit half of Jeff City in here.

name: Sawadee Thai Cuisine
address: 103 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: Nice price！Nice steak！Will definitely come again！！
5 stars from me is a rarity.  But this place deserves it.  Big flavors.  Great tastes.  And they make it to your level of spice.  Can't wait to go there again!
This is by far the best Thai restaurant that I have been to; outside of Thailand! I grew up eating a lot of Thai food, so I love it when I find some that's authentic.
This place is always overlooked and it deserves better! Tiny little restaurant with amazing food and quick service! Definitely try the Thai Tea!

What a delight to the pallet!  A very nicely crisp salmon on top of al dente vegetables with a spicy red curry and white rice.  

The building seems like it was built in an alleyway but don't let the location fool you.  Very clean restroom and amazing service while I was here.

Everything on the menu looked awesome but the people around me platters looked even better.  I would definitely come back for more.  Ps. Great Price!

name: Spectators
address: 232 E High St, Jefferson City, MO 65101, USA
reviews: I went to this establishment for the first time on Jan 17 2020.  My main reason was to play their bar bingo which by the way is free to play.  It is called extreme bingo.  You have a chance to win a 52 inch TV or $100 gift card.  They even had a game you could win $3000.  All for free.  So I had a some food from there kitchen which I would give 5 stars for.  The staff will get 5 stars plus.  Very friendly and always a step ahead of what I wanted.  Very friendly.  Plenty of seating.  Very wonderful experience.  Now I have a regular Thursday activity.  Nothing but good things to say.  Very nice place and staff.

Just look at the pics, tiny burger, child-size order of fries, made no better by lunch time bartending waitress. 
Blaring music in a empty lunch time place to run you out and keep it empty.
I'll bet it's fine for evening drinkers, bad lunch experience.

There's a reason they have the best bartender in town... No really. They literally have the #1 voted bartender, Faith. Want a drink and a great service? Pull a seat downtown with Faith or Pat tell em I sent you. Seriously, tell em. They'll get a kick out of it!

Nice atmosphere and good bands but the service is HORRIBLE.  You have to wait forever to get food and drinks. Not sure if they have waitresses anymore. In past visits they would come to the tables for you to order stuff, now they ignore you until you go to the bar and wait forever for them to serve you.

There was multiple music playing. 
The bathrooms were clean.
Service was good.
Food was okay. 
Multiple pool tables down stairs and a bar. No bartender, though.

name: Ria's Restaurant & Lounge
address: 3550 W Edgewood Dr #6955, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: The food there is really good, the service is friendly. And if you like lasagna, you will love their's! Also the atmosphere is nice. There are TVs in the bar area but they have never been overly loud, which we appreciate while also catching up on scores. A good experience.

I had only done Ria's lunch buffet and hadn't done it for a couple years because buffet food never sets well with me.  I was pleasantly surprised with our Saturday evening visit!!  The servers were pleasant and attentive but most importantly, our food was wonderful.  Everything was fresh and hot!  Will definitely be going back.

Food was excellent. 
Menu offers a great selection from salad, meats, seafood, pasta and pizza. Wonderful server! Very attentive and happily answered all of our menu related questions.
Second time we have eaten @ Ria's and it was equally as good as the first time.
There lunch buffet is very good and priced just right @10.68. Very clean and friendly staff.

I got the gyro sandwich, which was was good. However, for $9 I didn't feel like it was worth it. The others in my party said the food was good or so-so, with one person saying their salad was way too salty. The service was very slow, and the waiter wasn't very friendly. And the atmosphere left much to be desired; it didn't feel like they had personalized the restaurant much with artwork or unique music. Overall, I wouldn't be absolutely opposed to going back to Ria's, but I wouldn't seek it out either.

name: Dudley's
address: 5525 Bus 50 W, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Food was good but took FOREVER can't do on a real lunch break
Great breakfast dinner
All ways a great place to eat the severce is grate
Always fast and cheerful service and always good food. Will continue to dine here.
Good food, friendly staff

name: Red Lobster
address: 3519 Country Club Dr, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: We got a to-go order and it was overcooked and NOT hot when got it home (we don't live far away). Our salad was warmer than the pasta. The portion is small for the price, for the take out. Sorry but you all need to work a bit on ALL people that spend money at your restaurant. Even fast food serves hotter food then what we got. Dining in is better but really disappointed about the take out.

Miracle was the best server we've had in a long time! She was personal, motivated to make sure we had the best night and took care of our every need. She is the definition of "Customer Service." If you go to this Red Lobster, request for her to be your server...if you have to wait, do it!

My husband and I and I arrived  here yesterday for three course meal. At first it was a little awkward as we were waiting and nobody was upfront. As we waited for a little bit somebody to finally come and then we settled. Our server was absolutely awesome he was funny and absolutely the best our soup was hot and delicious both of our main courses and desserts were really good!!!!  I would Highly recommend this place.

Went there for lunch today. Hadn't been for awhile because service had gone downhill for a bit, but is back up to par now. Our waiter was Ernie today and he was on point with everything. Ernie, you are awesome! Food was out just in time and excellent.

We had the best customer service! Tabitha made sure we always had full drinks and reloaded our biscuits throughout the dinner! Not a single negative thing to say about the service or the food! You got to try the new shrimp rangoons were great!

name: Zesto Drive-In
address: 1730 Jefferson St, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Food here is very good, our order was quickly prepared, and the staff was very friendly.

Good local owned BBQ & Ice cream. One of the few places that you still get butterscotch.  Nothing fancy, but that's what makes it a better place in the summertime for a cold dessert w/a relaxed atmosphere, but that all depends on the crowd there.
The very best diner. Went there and food was great and staff are very welcoming.

Not a bad place to go if you looking for a nice non chain food joint. This place was the bee's knees about 15 years ago, but new places came along and its changed. They still have good soft serve ice cream though. Service is pretty good for young high school kids. 4 stars cause they are still around and a Jefferson city legend when you here about this place. Stop on in and have a bite.

Your Trustworthy Critic

Just excellent Auto body shop. 
Very pleasant management.

name: Freddy's Frozen Custard & Steakburgers
address: 2103 Missouri Blvd #4718, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: It was a cool place, with a unique atmosphere designed to make you want to come back, options unique to Freddy's not commonly found elsewhere. I got a chicken sandwich with French fries, it was pretty good although I heard the onion rings were better. I reccomend it.

My baby, wife and I stopped in to have lunch today and the restaurant was very busy. When I redeemed my free meal coupon I received from Veterans day the young lady upgraded my meal. Excellent customer service all around, our food came out fast and hot, 5 stars all the way! Keep up the good work!!
Pretty good burgers and fries. I like the spicy fry sauce. This used to be my go to spot for fried dill pickles, but sadly they quit having them so I don’t go as often now.
First time going. Ordered the chocolate shake and it was pretty delicious. Freddie's is a little pricey in my opinion. The restaurant appeared clean and there wasn't much if a wait.

Fantastic burgers!!! The frozen custard concretes live up to the reputation. I love the fries. Cooked just right however overseasoned just a tad. Not to the point they're inedible though. Still delicious.

name: Culver's
address: 1920 Jefferson St, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Always have a great time. Food is very fresh. Ice cream is also very good. Building temperature was a bit cold, being January.

One of my favorite places to eat in Jefferson City Missouri. Food is consistently great and service is even better! Owners are extremely friendly and Hands-On. The restaurant is always clean and well-kept, Landscaping is gorgeous. Can't say enough about how much I would recommend this restaurant to anyone!
Got Ice Cream only. Will return to try a sandwich. They were very quick in the drive through and the lady at the window was very nice.

The food was good yes, but the service was aweful. The lady at the window was very rude and the lady that brought us our food out we asked for ketchup and she said there's some in the bag and we said no there's not and she just walked off. We sat there for five minutes waiting for her to come back with ketchup and she never did so we had to go back through the drive through. Good food but we won't be going back.
I had the mushroom swiss burger and it was excellent! The service was fast and friendly and the food was delicious!

name: Chipotle Mexican Grill
address: 1400 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Best food ever! The staff is super friendly and so fun to joke with while watching them prepare your food to perfection.

First time here.. You go down the line and the workers serve you, Subway style but with Mexican food. So good and you get a lot. Was so hungry I forgot to get pictures but it was all good, especially the chicken. The seasoning was great, I would call it mild and robust not spicy :-)

My favorite part about going into a Chipotle is that no matter if the line is long or short, the time it takes to get your food is always reasonable. With that being said, the only way this is achieved is if everyone cohesively works as one unit. This specific Chipotle needs improvement in this area.
Burritos are great! Only issue is the amount of chips you get is pathetic. I got 13 total chips in my bag. For 2 people, this is a joke.

I love chipotles food but terrible staff every time I visit this location in the evenings.  Tonight I was trying to place a to go order and online only let's you pay with a card. So I called and the guy was very rude and kept telling me I needed to download the app, which also only let's you pay with a card. I was just trying to get dinner with some cash. I completely understand if that's not possible right now but lose the attitude. I was originally going to just place the order with my card if that was what was needed but I'm not doing it now.

name: Lee's Famous Recipe Chicken
address: 1550 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: Super friendly! Quick and good. Manager checked on us to make sure everything was good. And watched him help a lady bring her food to her table. Top notch place.
It almost always fresh at this location if you go into the store, instead of the drive-thru!😉

As I have come to expect from our local Lee's Famous Recipe Chicken, the Jefferson City location was great. The food was fresh and delicious. The service was prompt and friendly.  Unlike so many fast food restaurants I have eaten at, the tables were spotless. The location is easy to find and access.

Was there at 1100am today, service great as always, but my chicken tasted like day old chicken  was dry and only warm not hot. Mine was crispy, my wife ordered famous, was dry,warm, and smelled like fish. Was our favorite chicken place.

I enjoy Lees Children. The service is always nice and the food is good. Parking can be a little tricky but not bad.  Lee’s chicken is not the typical greasy chicken you get from other places.  It has a good flavor and nice crispy skin.

name: Las Palmas Taquiera
address: 510 Ellis Blvd suite f, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: A cute, little Mexican restaurant. The owner was so friendly and polite. The food was delicious! I got the chicken fajitas. Usually chicken gets dried out in this dish but it was so juicy. Highly recommend trying this place out. You won’t be disappointed.
The food was excellent and very authentic. The owners were incredibly friendly and personable. Highly recommended!
The owners were extremely attentive, hospitable, and accommodating. The food was delicious, too! Jefferson City needed some authentic Mexican food!

The food was good and very fresh. The owner was awesome. He even had a mango salsa that my wife and I tried. The place was very clean and neat. Prices wise was very reasonable. We will definitely go back
If you want authentic Mexican food here in Jefferson City...THIS IS THE PLACE!!!

name: Sawaddee Thai Cuisine
address: 2215 Missouri Blvd, Jefferson City, MO 65109, USA
reviews: I’m am surprised at the relatively high rating for this restaurant. Coming from the west coast where great Thai food abounds, I can tell you this isn’t it. Hugely disappointed every time I have gone in there. I’ve finally given up.

The food is delicious!!! 
There is a wide selection.
The service was excellent. The waitress was very helpful and answered all of our questions.
The food was serviced hot and fast. 
It you like Thai, this is a must stop in Jefferson City.

They just reopened after a few weeks being closed.  I did not think this was near as good as the downtown location.  Had high hopes.  I ordered the sweet and sour chicken for lunch.  Very little chicken and I wanted a mild spice (4) but got one that was closer to a 7 or 8 instead.
Freaking awesome. The food portions are a little conservative,  but flavor is amazing and the service is quick and kind. Reminded me of being at my grandma's!

This is the place to go to when you want to treat your belly and your tongue to the best hottest food in town. You can get from zero to a hundred and heat intensity index, even at 0 the food is just spectacular. It is Affordable, family-friendly, and the kids will actually really like it. It has a wonderful assortment of appetizers that are simply to die for.  I recommend the potstickers, and my favorite is the jasmine rice with your choice of tofu, chicken, beef, or pork. You can also make a combination of two meats for your meal. They have yet to get my order wrong in all the many years that I've been going to both of their locations in Jefferson City.
